blog->mk_list_page( array( "blog_id"=> 'articles', "scheme"=>($px->conf()->scheme ?? 'https'), "domain"=>($px->conf()->domain ?? ''), "title"=>($px->conf()->name ?? ''), "description"=>'ブログの説明テキスト', "orderby" => 'update_date', "scending" => 'desc', "dpp" => 5, "lang"=> $px->lang(), "url_home"=>($px->canonical('/') ?? ''), "url_index"=>($px->canonical() ?? ''), "author"=>($px->conf()->copyright ?? ''), ) ); ?>
